meta.title: Master Prompt for Invoice POS System
meta.description: Complete specification to generate the Invoice POS React Application.

technical_stack.state_management: React Hooks (useState, useEffect) with centralized state in App.tsx

layout_rules.header: Fixed top bar, Dark Gray (#1f2937), contains Logo, Company Name, and Navigation Links.
layout_rules.content: Full-width fluid container, light gray background.
layout_rules.split_view_pattern: Master-Detail layout. List takes 30% width, Detail takes 70% width when active. Transitions smoothly.
layout_rules.forms: Full-page views for creating/editing. Clean white containers with large padding.

receivables_widget.visualization: Multi-colored progress bar breakdown: Blue (Current), Yellow (1-15 days), Orange (16-30 days), Red (>45 days).
receivables_widget.quick_action: Blue '+ New' button with dropdown linking to New Invoice, New Stock (GRN), New Payment.

1_dashboard.analytics: Bar chart comparing Sales, Cost, and Profit over 6 months.

2_customers.layout: Split View (List 30% / Overview 70%) or Full Width List.

overview_panel.content: Read-only customer details, payment terms, currency, and a transaction history table.

fields: Primary Contact (Salutation, First Name, Last Name)

3_inventory.layout: Split View (List 30% / Overview 70%) or Full Width List.

left_pane_70.content: GRN Form. Date, Supplier Select. Line Item Grid (Select Item, Qty, Cost, Discount). Grand Total. Confirm Button.
left_pane_70.logic: Confirming updates stock quantity and unit cost price for selected items.

right_pane_30.content: Supplier Management Sidebar. List of suppliers, Search, Add New Supplier Form.

features: Basic Info: Name, SKU, Category, Unit

4_invoice_pos.layout: Split View (List 30% / Overview 70%) for viewing history.

left_column_55: Header: Select Customer, Invoice Date, Due Date.
Product Selection: Search Bar, Category Filter Pills, Grid of Product Cards (Image, Name, Price).
right_column_45: Cart List: Row per item with Qty +/-, Price, Remove X.
Footer: Subtotal, Tax (10%), Discount (5%), Grand Total.

features: Cash Mode: Large Input for Amount Received. Auto-calc Change/Balance.
Validation: Complete Order disabled if cash insufficient.

data_structures.customer_model: id, name, company, email, phone, receivables, currency, payment_terms
data_structures.item_model: id, sku, name, category, stock_qty, cost, price, supplier, image_url
data_structures.invoice_model: id, number, customer_id, date, status, line_items[], totals
data_structures.supplier_model: id, name, contact, phone, email, address

instructions: Generate the complete React application code based on this specification. Ensure all view transitions (List -> Create -> List) are handled smoothly. Use mock data constants to populate the app initially.
